You are a Dynamics 365 for Field Service Administrator. You configure Route Scheduling Optimization (RSO) and publish the schedule.

choices.B: Optimize Schedule field is not set to Yes.

choices.D: Scheduling Method is not set to Optimize.
choices.C: The Work Location field is not set to Onsite.
